title: Chiefs (Recognition) (No. 4) Order, 2015
content:
10th July, 2015 Statutory Instruments 159
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO. 44 OF2015
The Chiefs Act
(Laws,Volume16,Cap.287)
The Chiefs (Recognition) (No. 4) Order, 2015
WHEREASthePresidentissatisfiedthatthepersonnamedinthe
ScheduletothisOrderisentitledtoholdtheofficespecifiedtherein
asrequiredbysubsection(2)ofsection threeoftheChiefsAct:
NOWTHEREFORE,inexerciseofthepowerscontainedinsection
threeoftheChiefsAct,thefollowingOrderismade:
1. ThisOrdermaybecitedastheChiefs(Recognition)(No.4) Title
Order,2015.
2. The personnamedintheSchedule is recognisedas being, Recognition
withintheareainZambiadescribedintheSchedule,theholderof ofChief
theofficespecifiedintheSchedule.
